items.name: Component_CommonEventBehavior
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_CommonEventBehavior
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_CommonEventBehavior extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    *
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        if @object.rid?
            @object.record = RecordManager.commonEvents[@object.rid]
            @object.interpreter?.object = this
            @object.commands = @object.record.commands
        @setupEventHandlers()

    ###*
    * A component which allows a game object to execute common-events.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_CommonEventBehavior
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof gs
    ###
    constructor: () ->
        super()

        ###*
        * @property readyToStart
        * @type boolean
        * @private
        ###
        @readyToStart = no

        ###*
        * @property initialized
        * @type boolean
        * @private
        ###
        @initialized = no

        @callDepth = 0
        @callIdStack = []
        @nextCallId = 0

    ###*
    * Serializes the component into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    * @return {Object} The data-bundle.
    ###
    toDataBundle: ->
        return {
            initialized: @initialized,
            readyToStart: @readyToStart
        }

    ###*
    * Restores the component from a data-bundle
    *
    * @method restore
    * @param {Object} bundle- The data-bundle.
    ###
    restore: (data) ->
        @setup()
        @readyToStart = data.readyToStart
        @initialized = data.initialized

    ###*
    * Adds event-handlers for mouse/touch events
    *
    * @method setupEventHandlers
    ###
    setupEventHandlers: ->
        if !@object.interpreter then return

        if @object.record.startCondition == 1
            @object.interpreter.onFinish = =>
                if not @object.record.parallel
                    @object.events?.emit("finish", this)
        else
            if @object.record.parallel
                @object.interpreter.onFinish = (sender) => 
                    @object.removeComponent(sender)
                    if not @object.record.singleInstance
                        @callIdStack.push(sender.context.callId)
                        @callDepth--
            else
                @object.interpreter.onFinish = (sender) =>
                    @callIdStack.push(sender.context.callId)
                    @callDepth--
                    @object.events.emit("finish", this)

    ###*
    * Initializes the common-event.
    *
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        GameManager.variableStore.setupLocalVariables(@object.record)

        @object.record.parameters = if @object.record.parameters? then @object.record.parameters else []
        @object.record.startCondition = if @object.record.startCondition? then @object.record.startCondition else 0
        @object.record.parallel = if @object.record.parallel? then @object.record.parallel else no
        @object.record.conditionSwitch = if @object.record.conditionSwitch? then @object.record.conditionSwitch else null
        @object.record.conditionEnabled = @object.record.conditionEnabled

        if @object.record.startCondition == 1
            @object.interpreter = new gs.Component_CommandInterpreter()
            @object.interpreter.onFinish = =>
                if not @object.record.parallel
                    @object.events?.emit("finish", this)
                else
                    @restart()


            @object.interpreter.context.set(@object.record.index, @object.record)
            @object.addComponent(@object.interpreter)

        @initialized = yes

    ###*
    * Starts the common-event interpreter with the specified parameters.
    *
    * @method start
    * @param {Object} parameters The common-event's parameters which can be configured in database.
    ###
    start: (parameters) ->
        @startParameters = parameters

        if @object.interpreter? and not @object.interpreter.isRunning
            @object.commands = @object.record.commands
            @readyToStart = yes
            @object.events?.emit("start", this)

        if @object.record.startCondition == 0 and @object.record.parallel
            @object.events?.emit("finish", this)

    ###*
    * Initializes variable-store with the start-up parameters configured for the
    * common-event in Database.
    *
    * @method setupParameters
    ###
    setupParameters: (parameters, parentContext) ->
        if parameters? and parameters.values?
            for i in [0...parameters.values.length]
                value = parameters.values[i]
                parameter = @object.record.parameters[i]
                if parameter? and value?
                    GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(parentContext)
                    switch parameter.type
                        when 1 # Number
                            value = GameManager.variableStore.numberValueOf(value)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(@object.interpreter.context)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setNumberValueTo(parameter.numberVariable, value)
                        when 2 # Boolean
                            value = GameManager.variableStore.booleanValueOf(value)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(@object.interpreter.context)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setBooleanValueTo(parameter.booleanVariable, value)
                        when 3 # String
                            value = GameManager.variableStore.stringValueOf(lcs(value))
                            GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(@object.interpreter.context)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setStringValueTo(parameter.stringVariable, value)
                        when 4 # List
                            value = GameManager.variableStore.listObjectOf(value)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(@object.interpreter.context)
                            GameManager.variableStore.setListObjectTo(parameter.listVariable, value)

    
    generateCallId: () ->
        if @callIdStack.length > 0
            return @callIdStack.pop()
        else
            return @nextCallId++
    
    
    ###*
    * Calls the common-event with the specified parameters.
    *
    * @method call
    * @param {Object} parameters The common-event's parameters which can be configured in database.
    ###
    call: (parameters, settings, parentContext) ->
        if not @object.record.singleInstance
            callId = @generateCallId()
            interpreter = new gs.Component_CommandInterpreter()
            interpreter.context.set(@object.record.index + "_" + callId, @object.record)
            interpreter.context.callId = callId
            GameManager.variableStore.clearTempVariables(interpreter.context)
            @object.commands = @object.record.commands
            @callDepth++
        else
            interpreter = @object.interpreter || new gs.Component_CommandInterpreter()
            interpreter.context.set(@object.record.index, @object.record)
            @object.commands = @object.record.commands

        interpreter.repeat = no
        interpreter.object = @object
        interpreter.settings = settings if settings
        @object.interpreter = interpreter

        GameManager.variableStore.setupTempVariables(interpreter.context)
        @setupParameters(parameters, parentContext)

        if @object.record.parallel
            interpreter.onFinish = (sender) =>
                @object.removeComponent(sender)
                if not @object.record.singleInstance
                    @callIdStack.push(sender.context.callId)
                    @callDepth--
            interpreter.start()
            @object.addComponent(interpreter)

            return null
        else
            interpreter.onFinish = (sender) =>
                @callIdStack.push(sender.context.callId)
                @callDepth--
                @object.events.emit("finish", this)
            return interpreter

    ###*
    * Stops the common-event interpreter.
    *
    * @method stop
    ###
    stop: ->
        if @object.interpreter?
            @object.interpreter.stop()
            @object.events?.emit("finish", this)

    ###*
    * Resumes a paused common-event interpreter.
    *
    * @method resume
    ###
    resume: ->
        if @object.interpreter?
            @object.interpreter.resume()
            @object.events?.emit("start", this)
            @object.events?.emit("resume", this)


    ###*
    * Restarts the common event. If the common event has a condition then the restart
    * will only happen if that condition is true.
    *
    * @method restart
    ###
    restart: ->
            if @object.record.conditionEnabled
                if GameManager.variableStore.booleanValueOf(@object.record.conditionSwitch)
                    @start()
            else
                @start()

    ###*
    * Restarts the common event if it is parallel and the conditions are met.
    *
    * @method restartIfNecessary
    ###
    restartIfNecessary: ->
        if @object.interpreter? and @object.record.startCondition == 1 and not @object.interpreter.isRunning
            @restart()

    ###*
    * Updates the common-event interpreter.
    *
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        if not @initialized
            @setup()

        if @object.interpreter? and @readyToStart
            @readyToStart = no
            @setupParameters(@startParameters)
            @object.interpreter.start()

        @restartIfNecessary()

    ###*
    * Not implemented yet.
    *
    * @method erase
    ###
    erase: ->

gs.Component_CommonEventBehavior = Component_CommonEventBehavior
